Name: Marcus Briggs٫ Spacecorp Commander
Rules: (Becomes 'Brigg's Remorse' if you already control ~@.)\nAs Commander -- Assets you control have Airdrop (You may choose to have that asset deploy immediately [no deployment period]٫ but you have a 25% chance to forfeit it unless you pay half of its cost again [rounded up.])\nAs Asset -- After interceptors are declared٫ if ~@ would do combat damage to a commander٫ you may put a combatant in your hand onto the battlefield attacking. If you do٫ forfeit it at the end of your turn.

Name: Briggs' Remorse
Rules: Choose anything to take [X] damage.\nYou may deploy an asset in your hand with <u>Generalized Cost</u> (The cost of the card if all typed symbols were replaced with generic numbers. E.x. ~ has a generalized cost of [1].) [X] or less without paying its cost.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Marcus Briggs٫ Spacecorp Commander` back into your deck.)

Name: Space Shuttle
Rules: <u>Vehicle</u> (When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may choose another asset to attach it to. The combined unit has all effects of both assets٫ and the highest attack power٫ health٫ and ranged status of the two.)٫ <u>Spacecraft</u> (~ can only intercept or be intercepted by assets with Spacecraft.)

Name: Mining Fleet
Rules: <u>Mob</u> (You may assign any number of mob combatants you control to a unit. You٫ not your opponent٫ choose how combat damage is divided among the intercepted and intercepting mob units you control.)٫ <u>Spacecraft</u> (~ can only intercept or be intercepted by assets with spacecraft.)\nA deck may have any number of ~ in it.\n~ can only mob with other spacecraft.

Name: Dropship Trooper
Rules: <u>Airdrop</u> (You may choose to have ~ deploy immediately [no deployment period]٫ but you have a 25% chance to <u>forfeit</u> it unless you pay half of its cost again [rounded up.])٫ <u>Mob</u> (You may assign any number of mob combatants you control to a unit. You٫ not your opponent٫ choose how combat damage is divided among the intercepted and intercepting mob units you control.)

Name: Lexi Xenos٫ Spacecorp Cadet
Subtype: Human Female Lux Spacecorp Doctor Recruit
Rules: (Becomes `Tales of a Brilliant Doctor` if you already control ~@.)\n<u>Rush</u> (~ can attack without waiting for her deployment period.)\n<u>Hippocratic Oath --</u> Whenever another combatant you control takes damage٫ ~@ gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Flavor: "...I will remember that there is art to medicine as well as science٫ and that warmth٫ sympathy٫ and understanding may outweigh the surgeon's knife or the chemist's drug..."

Name: Tales of a Brilliant Doctor
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose an asset then <u>Heal it Fully</u> (If the specified asset has attack power or health reductions٫ reset them. Then remove all damage from it.)\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Lexi Xenos٫ Spacecorp Cadet` back into your deck.)
Flavor:
"Did you hear? They brought down a miner from space yesterday!"
"No Why?"
"Poor lady got crushed between her ship and her rock٫ paralyzed from the legs down."
"Who was tasked with the surgery?"

Name: Prototype Tractor Beam
Rules: <u>Equipment</u> (When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may choose an asset to attach it to.)\n[T]٫ utilize the attached asset: Choose an asset to utilize.
Flavor: "And that concludes my thesis presentation!" Releases Strap.\nTractor Beam Clatters to the Ground.\nAudience chuckles٫ Lina blushes.

Name: Lina Pathak٫ Spacecorp Cadet
Subtype: Augmented Human Female Spacecorp Engineer Recruit
Rules:
(Becomes `Tales of a Talented Engineer` if you already control ~@.)
<u>Rush</u> (~ can attack without waiting for her deployment period.)
When ~@ enters choose an Augmented or Drone to gain <u>Armor 2</u> (Negate the first 2 damage ~ would take each turn.).
If you control an Equipment ~@ gets +2/+2.
Flavor: "I lost my arm when I was a little girl٫ my dad built me a new one in the garage. I have wanted to be a cyberneticist ever since."

Name: Tales of a Talented Engineer
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose an Augmented or Drone to have its attack power and health permanently swapped.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Lina Pathak٫ Spacecorp Cadet` back into your deck.)٫
Flavor: "Did you hear? Lina's tractor beam caught fire last night! It almost burned the Musk building down!"

Name: Fawning Bar Babe
Rules: <u>Rush</u> (~ can attack without waiting for her deployment period.)
Flavor: "*giggles* so you're a pilot huh?"

Name: Linus Rau٫ Spacecorp Cadet
Rules:
(Becomes `Tales of a Hotshot Pilot` if you already control ~@.)
<u>Rush</u> (~ can attack without waiting for his deployment period.)
~ enters with a <u>Transient</u> `Fawning Bar Babe`.
If you control an <u>Explicitly Female</u> (It must say Female in its type) asset ~@ gets +2/+2.
Flavor:
"You know Linus you coulda come to my dorm last night instead٫ you know Lexi's not a snitch..."
"But you were so busy putting out a fire! I couldn't interrupt! And besides Lexi's a prude..."
"Your a pig Linus Rau you know that?"
"And your a beauty Lina Pathak٫ you know that?"

Name: Tales of a Hotshot Pilot
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose up to two Female assets to gain control of until the end of their owners' next turn.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Linus Rau٫ Spacecorp Cadet` back into your deck.)
Flavor: "Did you hear? Not one but two girls came out of Linus' dorm this morning٫ his CO was furious!"

Name: Shay Bowen٫ Spacecorp Cadet
Rules:
(Becomes `Tales of a Stoic Diver` if you already control ~@.)
<u>Armed -- `Military Grade Pilot Interface`</u> (~ enters with a `Military Grade Pilot Interface` attached.)
~ can be utilized without waiting for his deployment period.
Whenever ~ <u>Remote Control</u>s an asset٫ until end of turn٫ it gets +2/+2 and <u>Rush</u>.
Whenever you gain control of a Female asset shuffle a `Blackmail` into your deck unless an opponent lets you draw a card.
Flavor: There are cameras hidden everywhere and Shay knew how to use them... he even managed to install a few more of his own.

Name: Tales of a Stoic Diver
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose an asset engaged in combat to set aside until end of turn.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Shay Bowen٫ Spacecorp Cadet` back into your deck.)
Flavor: Somehow whenever Linus performed one of his escapades his roommate was nowhere to be seen.

Name: Spacecorp Cadet
Flavor: "...I swear to boldly go where no person has gone before. I swear to acquire knowledge for the betterment of all mankind..."

Name: Caught All Three
Rules: Choose one <u>Explicitly Male</u> and two different <u>Explicitly Female</u> assets at least one of which you control.\nChoose one of the Female assets to٫ until end of turn٫ gain <u>Fear</u> (The chosen asset losses all other effects.)\nThe other two assets get +2/-1 as long as they both remain on the battlefield.
Flavor: "You three... my office... right now...

Name: Far Side Deployment
Rules: Choose up to three assets to gain <u>Fear</u> (The chosen assets loose all other effects.) until end of turn.\nCreate a <u>Transient</u> `Space Shuttle`. <u>Forfeit</u> (The specified card's owner puts it into their discard pile.) it after it engages in combat.
Flavor: ...Since you three seam to be such good friends٫ I'll put in a good word to have you deployed together... somewhere your antics won't cause trouble!" ~Yuki Norimoto٫ Enforcement Officer Female Dormitory Block 4

Name: Space Tether
Rules: <u>Spacecraft</u> (~ can only intercept or be intercepted by assets with spacecraft.)\n<u>Unresponsive</u> (This effect can't be activated during response windows)٫ [T]: Choose a card on the battlefield٫ set it aside then return it to the battlefield at the end of the turn. You have a 25% chance to <u>Forfeit</u> (The specified card's owner puts it into their discard pile.) that card.
Flavor: Tethers act as batteries for kinetic energy. Spending some to slingshot ships to the far corners of the solar system; gaining some when an incoming ship arrives.

Name: Crash Landing
Rules: <u>Forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) any number of assets you control: Choose an asset to take X (X is the forfeit assets' attack power.) damage.
Flavor: On Linus' first day on Station 27 he crashed a miner into the landing dock.

Name: Set Fire to the Generator Room
Rules: Choose a generator٫ its owner <u>forfeits</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) it.\nThere is a 50% chance you <u>forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) a random generator you control.
Flavor: On Lina's first day on Station 27 she almost took down power on the whole station.

Name: Botched Stitching
Rules: <u>Prepare 2 -- [M]</u> (Pay [M] and put ~ into your deck second from the top. When you would draw ~٫ instead deploy it without paying its cost.)\nDraw 2 cards٫ then discard a card at random.
Flavor: On Lexi's first day on Station 27٫ for the first time in her life٫ she botched a surgery.

Name: Miner with Unstable Rockets
Rules: <u>Spacecraft</u> (~ can only intercept or be intercepted by assets with spacecraft.)\nWhenever ~ attacks٫ you have a 50% chance to discard a card at random.
Flavor: Out past the asteroid belt your alone٫ Earth is 30 minutes away by radio. Other stations are at least 2 or 3. And both of the girls on the station hate you... whats a man to do?

Name: Wasted Pilot
Rules: At the beginning of each turn ~ gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 at random. This effect can't reduce its health below 1.
Flavor: "Got the worst post in this whole solar system... no no I'm.... fine..."

Name: Reprobate Mechanic
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Ballistic Pistol`</u> (~ enters with a `Ballistic Pistol` attached.)\nIf an opponent's commander would lose morale outside of combat٫ it loses that much morale +1 instead.
Flavor: "Being alone out here has a way of getting to your head." ~Jerry٫ Station 27's Mechanic

Name: Stacked Deck
Rules: <u>Advantageous</u> (When ~ resolves٫ draw a card.)\nChoose a card on the stack٫ replace it with the top card of its controller's deck.
Flavor: "I've never lost a fair game..." ~Seth٫ Station 27's Cook

Name: Mulligan
Rules: If an opponent searched their deck for a card this turn٫ ~ costs [M] less.\nEach player shuffles their hand into their deck٫ then draws that many cards plus one.
Flavor: Lina quickly became one of the boys٫ after she became a regular at the nightly card tournaments.

Name: Shuffle
Rules: ~ costs [1] less if you didn't go first.\nChoose a commander٫ its owner shuffles their deck.
Flavor: Lexi tried joining Lina and the others for cards a few times... every time she found the rampant cheating distasteful.

Name: Lucas' Ultimate Prize
Rules: <u>Decision</u>٫ You may only deploy ~ if a Lux card is on the battlefield.\n-> <u>Get Wasted -- [4][+]</u> Choose any number of Male assets٫ they each permanently get +1/-1 or -1/+1 at random. -> <u>Pin Down -- [M][M][M][+]</u> Choose a Female asset to٫ until end of turn٫ gain <u>Fear</u>.\n-> <u>Take Turns -- [M][M][M][M][+]</u> Choose an asset to take 1 damage from each other asset chosen by ~. Double this damage if that asset has <u>Fear</u>.
Flavor: Lexi followed protocol٫ still crying٫ she reported what had happened...

Name: The Next Day It Happened Again
Rules: <u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)\n-> <u>Do It Again -- [M][M][M][I][I][+]</u> Choose an effect that was put into your discard last turn. Deploy it without paying its cost.\n-> <u>Get Far Away --[1][+]</u> Create a `Space Shuttle`. <u>Forfeit</u> (The specified card's owner puts it into their discard pile.) it after it engages in combat.
Flavor: Tears running down her cheeks Lexi launched the station's primary shuttle. By taking it she would easily outpace anyone who tried to follow.

Name: Girlfriend Court Marshal
Rules:
You may only deploy ~ if you control a Female renowned asset.
As an additional cost to deploy ~٫ <u>Forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) a Generator you control.
Choose a combatant to be <u>Forfeit</u> by its owner.
Your commander gains 3 <u>Injury</u> (Whenever it would gain morale it instead removes Injury first.).
Flavor: "It's not my fault the generator blew up while Lucas was helping me fix it." ~Lina Pathak
